title: What font is this?
content:
Anybody know this font? What foundry?   
 ![font sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013053019im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/27392.jpg)
author: brianj1400

comments.content:
Congratulations gentlmen! It IS Cachet. I looked at Zemestro but I saw a distinct difference in the cap 'M' (the verticals on Cache angle inwards).   
   
Thanks again for the quick reply!
a similar design for consideraion...just in case you just looking for a nice font for look/feel. Section from Lindy , avail at Thirstype in 10 versions

I am going to go with Cachet because the 'S' has more of its   
angular character.
